General.Name: Beijing Seeyon Internet Software Cp
General.Description: BeiJing Seeyon Internet Software Corp. provides collaborative management software, solutions, platforms, and cloud services for organizational customers in China. It offers universal solutions, including process management, knowledge management, group control, unified portal, mobile office, system integration, and fee control management solutions; and customer, project, contract, HR, cost budget, fixed asset management solutions. The company also provides various industries solutions, such as IT services, insurance, instrumentation, telecom, electronics, transportation and logistics, real estate, education, food, finance, medical health, commercial retail, radio and television media, and fabricate; solutions for government and public utilities; and internet solutions. BeiJing Seeyon Internet Software Corp. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
